mapper.select: select SID, CORPID, NAME, PASSWORD, SLEVEL, CREDIT1, CREDIT2, CREDIT3, MANAGER, TELE, FAX, ORDERNUM, TEMPLETFILE, OPER, OPERTIME, RATE, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, RESERVE11, RESERVE12, RESERVE14, RESERVE15, RESERVE16, RESERVE17, RESERVE18, ITEMID, OPENFLAG, TOKENFLAG, CONTACT, CONTACTE, POSTCODE, MOBILE, PHONE, EUBEMAIL, DEVUSERID, VERSION, EBAYSITID, PROVINCEEN, CITYEN, DISTRICTEN, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, AMAZON, AMAZONFLAG, SPAYPALNAME, AMAZONURL, AMAZONURLNAME, EBAYSHOPID, EBAYSHOPNAME, ORDEROPER, PAYPALEMAIL, SHOPMANAGER, CSCARTEMAIL, DESCR, EMAIL, TEMPLETCONTENT, TEMPLETCLOB, RESERVE13, RESERVE19, RESERVE20, TOKENID, TOKENDESCR, STREET, STREETE, PROVINCE, CITY, DISTRICT, EUBTONKEN, SELLUSERID, EBAYFEEMONEYRATE, ACCESSKEYID, SECRETACCESSKEY, APPLICATIONNAME, SELLERID, MARKETPLACEID from db_shop where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
